attributes.action: All MP's to at least fully read their constituent's letter, after all they have just had a pay rise
attributes.additional_details:
After sending a letter to my MP which he told me that he could not fully read as it made his head go funny, I have decided to set this petition up.

After then writing to the Prime Minister to complain about MPs not properly reading the letters, I received a reply saying that it would not be right to interfere in an MP's business with his constituents and to effectively sort things out myself.

My complaint was a serious complaint to which I have spent months trying to sort out on my own whilst suffering illness.

Therefore I would like help to get this ridiculous farce changed

Please sign the petition to encourage change in the behaviour of our MPs so that they can at least deserve that pay rise they have just been awarded
